website_summaries.verdict: This plush mattress won't force you to sacrifice quality for affordability.
pros: Dual-layer mattress boasts gel-infused memory foam and a high-density foam base for supreme comfort and support
Mattress is both temperature-regulating and moisture-wicking to help you get plenty of rest night after night
Ventilated design improves air flow and provides you with an enhanced sleep environment
cons: Mattress tends to sag in the center
May be too firm for some users

customer_reviews.title: I order this matters after reading so many reviews but so disappointed after a long wait
customer_reviews.text: I just unpacked the gel mattress, and found it very poorly stitched mattress cover.. I order this matters after reading so many reviews but so disappointed after a long wait.
customer_reviews.author: Maverick

customer_reviews.title: Do not order
customer_reviews.text: Matress was infested with bedbugs, Amazon send a replacement and the same issue. Waiting on Amazon to pick up both matress. Now I'm freaking out about my home being infested with this bugs. I left the matress on my front porch waiting for pickup cus I don't even want to store them on my garage. Amazon just said that they were sorry and that an investigation will be open. I ordered another matress from a different brand and it was fine. I'm writing this review to save the hassle and headache to another customer. Super bad experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jessika Duarte

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Great mattress.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress arrived way faster than I could have hoped for, which means I got to start enjoying it right away. I couldn't wait for the new bed frame, so we used it on the floor for a night. Still perfectly comfortable. Just firm enough, with the right amount of give. I didn't think the smell everyone mentioned was all that noticeable after a little bit. I'd gladly recommend it as you get a lot for such a great price. As an added perk, my pup loved it and fell asleep within 3 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Lynn Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace our old mattress and read the reviews on this one before purchasing. It has been so far so good. No problems with the mattress. It had a weird smell at first but that has gone away. It said in the paperwork it would. I even slept on it the very first night before it had a chance to fully expand. I would recommend it- its very comfortable. Its firm yet soft if that makes sense. I just don't see the reason to spend thousands of dollars on the brand name tempuredic mattress when this is just fine. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Criste

customer_reviews.title: Its sinking!
customer_reviews.text: The first few years this mattress was great but then it slowly stopped bouncing back after you slept on it. It now has a permanent dip across the entire center of the mattress. This mattress has been turned often. This is what it looks like all the time now and once you lay in it you sink even further! Delivered 9/2012 was ok until 2015 completely unusable by 2018. So much for being a 20 year mattress when I bought it. **updated my rating due to a positive response from the manufacturer. After sending in multiple pictures they replaced the mattress. Hopefully this one will last longer. Would rate this 3.5 stars 4 if the first one didn't die!
customer_reviews.author: R. Boling

customer_reviews.title: Price and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Had one previously, but had to leave it. I would make sure you open it up on frame. Once opened very hard to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: gazita

customer_reviews.title: Haven't slept this good in years!
customer_reviews.text: We had the opportunity to sleep on a Queen mattress when we went out of town...I was sold! I have never slept so good. We got back from vacation and I made plans to order one for our home. We have been sleeping on it for almost 90 days and we absolutely love it. Comfortable, supportive, and just all around great!.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, improved circulation & sleep
customer_reviews.text: I have had trouble sleeping my entire life. It's off again, on again with back problems aggravating the situation. I can say that I have never slept better or more comfortably than on this mattress. That is saying a lot since one of my last mattresses cost several hundred dollars and was total garbage. I HIGHLY recommend this for the money. Circulation is improved also. My arms do not go numb at night (due to carpel tunnel). Whereas this is more the position I find myself sleeping in, I haven't had it happen in the last few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Immanuel K. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Only owned for a year and a half complete garbage
customer_reviews.text: I’m extremely upset I’ve never had a mattress only last a year and a half it’s sinking so badly throughout the entire middle of it that I am not sleeping anymore. I’ve tried rotating it even purchased a new box spring thinking that was the problem... my lower back is in extreme pain now. I do not recommend anyone purchase this mattress as I am now reading other reviewers with the same problem after owning theirs for 2 years I haven’t even owned my 2 years and this is a problem. You shouldn’t be allowed to sell a product like this period. buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Durban

customer_reviews.title: Wish it laster longer then a year.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, ordered this in May 2017 and we didn't even get a year out of it before the mattress started forming troughs. One side is so bad that I feel like I am rolling off the bed. Also the center is, the area where my wife and I don't sleep feels like new, so the best way to explain it is like sleeping on an A frame. I am really disappointed and being disabled this mattress was awesome when we first got it, just wish it lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Docking Bay 94

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mattress
customer_reviews.text: I have an adjustable base and waiting for back surgery after Covid clears. I used toppers and wanted to go full gel mattress. Got 10” because thicker not good for adjustable base. Best buy ever!!! Firm but, you don’t spill coffee getting in bed. You sink in just enough like a firm cloud. Works!!! No painful sleeping or positions.
customer_reviews.author: D Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long.
customer_reviews.text: We have had this mattress for just a little over a year. For the first 8ish months it was amazing! Loved it. Recommended it to everyone we knew. Had family and friends purchase it because of our high praises of the matress. Well... now... after a year of sleeping on this it has become the MOST uncomfortable. It’s already got dips in it and I’m afraid we are going to have to replace it. I had such HIGH hopes for this! I wish we could go back to the months of a full nights sleep without getting a back or hip ache.
customer_reviews.author: justashopper

customer_reviews.title: I'm finally getting to this review!!! (2nd year owner)
customer_reviews.text: In hindsight, I think a review after 2 years of restful sleep is apropos. What can't I say? After 2 years of sleeping on this Lucid Queen sized bed, I can HONESTLY say that I've not found a better mattress at such an affordable price. I'm the category of: my body likes firm support, but not too much. And, LUCID nails it! You need this mattress. Purchased: 10" Medium Firm Gel Memory Foam
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Valadez

customer_reviews.title: One Year Later
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these mattresses. A twin for my son in Feb 2019 and a queen for myself in Aug 2019. My son is 10 and has no complaints. My mattress has gotten so soft you sink into in. It's no longer supportive and is causing back pain. I've even tried flipping the mattress over to see if the underside is better. Nope. It's a squishy mess. Very disappointed in this mattress. I wouldn't suggest this product.
customer_reviews.author: BL Froman

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: This was for my RV. I purchased the medium plush. This bed was definitely firmer than I expected and the sides give in a lot when sitting on the edge. Aside from that, it was very comfortable to sleep on. I am a side sleeper and my hip didn't hurt like it did on the mattress I had before. My husband said he feels some sinkage but I do not Also I saw all the complaints of mold, so we did a lot of research and decided to be proactive. We purchased the Ravenwolf Marine Den Dry Mattress underlay. Very happy with the purchase. My only regret it I wish I would've gone thinner because of my height.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Freitas

customer_reviews.title: Slab of Concrete
customer_reviews.text: This is the hardest mattress I've ever seen. On a scale of 1 to 10...1 being a down filled pillow and 10 concrete. This is an 11. I was amazed...it has 0, zero, nada, nunca, give to it. I didnt expect bounce but I did expect to be able to sleep. I got the thickest one available and I couldn't imagine what the others would be like....now if you like a firm bed, this is for you. If you want something soft, giving and has a lil conformity to you body...scroll on friend.
customer_reviews.author: CmD

customer_reviews.title: Product doesn’t last long enough and is uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: 2 years in and we are finally replacing this mattress. There is a 100 day return policy and that’s about how long this mattress stayed comfortable. At first it was great, but the memory foam was shot within 6 months. My spouse and I both have dealt with back issues directly impacted by how uncomfortable this bed has become. It’s completely sunken in and gives no support at all. Terrible purchase and I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: jerseyjokes

customer_reviews.title: Very Firm
customer_reviews.text: Too firm. I purchased this because the description said it would be a medium firm but that is not the case here. It feels like I am sleeping on a hard floor surface. Update: After my initial review i updated to 5 stars. I received a reply to my original review from the seller and they were able to send me a mattress topper. This has made a significant difference and now I enjoy a great night's sleep. The customer service for this seller alone is worth 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: The Gorilla

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly comfortable mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this mattress! My other mattress was laid to rest in another room as it was a little too firm for my back. This one really gives a plush soft feeling yet supportive to my whole back. It makes a huge difference sleeping on something that eases you in to a peaceful sleep. I really recommend this - even better than huge brand named spring mattresses! For the price, it is a steal! Really wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Sameena

customer_reviews.title: Medium Plush is an accurate description.
customer_reviews.text: I developed spinal tumors and need surgery. Sleepibg was next to impossible for me. To aid in recover I took out our old flat medium memory foam king mattress that I purchased from Amazon in several years back and replaced it with a pair of Twin XL Lucid and went with Medium Plush gel/bamboo/charcoal mattresses. These mattresses are definety softer than medium. If you appreciate pillow top style mattresses then you would most likely enjoy this. I am 5'11" and 195. Wife is 5'7" 140 lbs. Coupled with the Lucid 300 adjustable bases it's hard not to find a comfortable position. We keep the house cool at around 72 degrees. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Silenced Within

customer_reviews.title: Firm but plush w/out feeling squishy at all, very supportive! Excellent quality, very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this (Full XL) to replace the abysmal "lumpy patio cushion style mattress" that came in our toy hauler... what an awesome bed, we're thrilled! Firm but plush w/out feeling squishy at all, very supportive. Not too heavy either, so we can still access the storage below, but still thick enough you'll never feel the wood base below. We put a mattress pad on it and done. To note, if your toy hauler mfg say's "it's a queen", they're mistaken, our "base" measured 54" by 80", so a Full XL (53" x 80") fits PERFECT in ours. Used a queen set of sheets and we're good to go... Will definitely be ordering another one for our bedroom next!
customer_reviews.author: MotoBella

customer_reviews.title: It feels like floating!
customer_reviews.text: I just put this mattress on the bed frame and after sitting on it for a few minutes, it was a struggle to stand up, simply because it felt like a zero gravity mattress. I let it expand for 48 hours and it filled the casing fully. I wish it were my bed, because it feels so good just sitting on it. I can just imagine how good it will be for sleeping. The kitties love it.
customer_reviews.author: Pluff mud studios

customer_reviews.title: I got a defected mattress
customer_reviews.text: I went with the Lucid brand because of the reputation and good reviews rather than sticking with a different brand I've ordered before. I let the mattress expand for 4 days and it never got to the 10 inches and it's hard as a rock. I see that is a problem for a lot of people. After the 4 days there was a huge divet in the center of the mattress that only expanded to 6.5 inches. The outside corners got to about 8.5. I'm working through the return process but it's a pain because there is no way to get it back in the box. Amazon is coming through with a carrier because Lucid couldn't help me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: Might as well sleep on the floor! TOO HARD!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought a LUCID last year and had been happy with it. With his advice I went ahead and ordered the LUCID 10in memory foam. The nix arrived damaged but the product was in excellent condition. It was left for 72 hours instead of the recommended 48, just for extra caution. The first time I tried it I said "uh oh! Too hard!" I have slept on it 2 night now. My back hurts and I do not feel well rested. This thing is like a brick! NO, I mean absolutely no give. I might add well be sleeping in the floor! This was supposed to be a medium! Will be returning. Very, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C.

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous mold in a place with no humidity - BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Matress has accumulated an insane amount of dangerous toxic mold - even though it's been in the desert (no humidity) in the "waterproof" cover that I was also sold. If you value your life and health, don't buy this brand. This is just another case of Amazon slapping a "Amazon's choice" stamp on something that's dangerous and poorly made. As far as comfort and durability - a bed of wet spaghetti has better durability than this. Be prepared to have an extremely stiff bed that eventually turns into a sunken mess.
customer_reviews.author: g

customer_reviews.title: For people who sleep on their sides
customer_reviews.text: Better than I thought quality, fit and finish. Sleeps great as I’ve waited a couple weeks to post review. I was a skeptic but I’m glad I took a chance on this bed. It hugs but supports your body. They make a firm version also but I tend to sleep on one of my sides or just toss and turn usually. I sleep good for now and let’s hope it keeps up.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Jennings II

customer_reviews.title: Very plush.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress did exactly what I needed, I have Fibromyalgia and arthritis so I was looking for something gentle on the body - this is it. I have used other foam/gel mattresses in the past and found them to be hard as a rock, so I went with the plush. Very nice. It took about 2 hours to "grow" into the full 10" and I slept on it after it had been opened about 12 hours. I also got a 2" bamboo mattress protector for a cover, Heaven!
customer_reviews.author: MGM Outlet

customer_reviews.title: Didn't expand to proper size and WAY too firm for me.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me. The mattress never expanded to full size which left the cover loose and baggy, it was also what I considered to be EXTRA firm, much too hard for me. Kudos to Amazon though they always take care of any problems you have with an order, I never hesitate to purchase on Amazon, their customer service is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Young

customer_reviews.title: Dear memory foam
customer_reviews.text: I’ll be honest, I didn’t like it. But dear mattress, it’s not you, it’s me. I just cannot stand memory foam. I turn to the side for reading, then I turn back. Problem? The mattress doesn’t forget my back shape. It memorizes too much. I swap it for my friend’s spring mattress. I’m now sleeping happily and so does my friend cuz they like memory foam. So this 5 star is from my friend. And my lesson is memory foam forgives but never forgets.
customer_reviews.author: Yooo

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend this matress.
customer_reviews.text: It was so hard to choose a matress. I spent hours reading the reviews and finally deciding for this one. I couldn't wait for it to arrive. It was so easy to unbox it , took about 5 hours to get to full size. There is only one problem I am now starting to have back pain and wake up tired. This matress is so firm. Since I recently had a c-section I am having back pain and the firmness of this matress is not helping, but i have to deal with it since I am disabled and can't afford to buy another matress.
customer_reviews.author: yolanda sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Completely Exceeded My Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I always thought that you had to spend thousands of dollars to get a comfortable mattress, boy was I wrong! I have had this thing for about nine months now and it is the most comfortable thing I have ever slept on. No more back pain at all. Two things to be aware of: 1) It needs to be broken in a little. About a week for some of the hardness to go away. 2) It will smell like a can of latex paint for a week or two. If you can, let this thing inflate and air out in a spare room for a while before you use it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described! Love this mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered a day earlier than promised, rose to the 10 inches, no odor, clean, firm, great nite sleep! Mattress did not sink when slept on. I weigh 155 & my husband weighs 200 lbs. I have back issues & this is firm & feels good for my back.My husband likes it to. If you like firm this is for you. As soon as we un rolled mattress it began to rise, after about 4 hours it was at 8 inches high. It rose to 10 inches that evening. We waited 36 hrs before sleeping on it though. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great purchase for the price! My husband and I needed a mattress desperately and didn't want to break the bank. After many reviews we decided on this one. We have had this a week now and sleep great! It was a little too firm for my preference but we purchased the lucid 2inch lavender topper and it makes this bed perfect! We both sleep so well now and no aches or pains when we wake up! You won't be disappointed in this mattress, especially for the price!!! It also did not take long to fully expand (maybe 6hours) and we did not notice a smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Picking the right firmness is key....because this feels like a soft brick
customer_reviews.text: After reading countless reviews, ordered Medium - it came quickly, it opened up and was fully expanded in one day. It was as described. The only caution I have for anyone is the medium is harder (to us) than what we expected. I know it’s a matter of preference and for us we were trying to relieve pain in joints. We are ordering another topper to help take pressure off of trigger points. It may just be us and maybe the soft would have been too soft. I just wanted to give a heads up for those with chronic pain - the medium is on the hard side of medium in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: some sections were medium soft, some parts quite firm with very little give whatsoever
customer_reviews.text: The mattress I received was over-sized and filled the length of the queen bed completely, making it difficult to tuck sheets in - and most especially my thick bedspread. The most egregious oversizing was on the side - up to 4 inches (not equal) hanging over the traditional queen base. Not aesthetic whatsoever, not to mention how it would erode the construction of the gel holding up that end of the mattress over time. Had to send it back. Good try - better quality control is required for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Hales

customer_reviews.title: suprising thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Easy setup. First time ever purchasing a bed online. First "Gel Memory Foam Bed" as well. I was kinda going in blindly, and I am very happy with my choice. I purchased the medium feel and I was surprised the first time I laid down. I was used to bouncy, springy beds and this bed is almost the opposite. It took a second to get used to, but once I did-it's great! I love that I semi-sink into it without getting stuck in it. Would def recommend. Oh-and it did help my back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: This mattress changed my life for the better!
customer_reviews.text: Buy this mattress immediately! Been sleeping on it for a month now and I cannot believe how much better my back feels. This is not a soft mattress...it is advertised as medium-firm, but I think it really should be advertised as firm. Regardless, the mattress inflated to its 10 inches in less than 24 hours and the difference in my sleep was apparent the first night. You're not going to find a mattress that provides this much support and this much muscleasier pain relief for this little money. Even if you have to replace it annually, you're still financially ahead. If you're tired of sleeping in the "trench" and your back is twisted up every morning, buy this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: A. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Still comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Got this mattress 12/2018, the 2019 medium queen model. I sleep on it every night and sit on it for 2-3 hours in the evening. It has held up well. I rotate it and sleep in different spots, and it hasn’t developed any permanent depressions. However it just me, and I weigh 130 lbs. It feels very comfortable. It felt too firm in the beginning, but either I got used to it or it softened up. I don’t use the mattress cover it made me sweaty. There is a cotton cover sewn over the foam and the removable cover seen in the product photos. No mold problems here. It’s been a good deal for me.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a adjustment
customer_reviews.text: Have had our mattress for one week now . Was easy to set up . Box was damaged when it arrived but we checked mattress and it was ok . We sleep very good on this mattress but for someone who has had a mattress with springs it is definitely a adjustment with that being said I have no regrets so far ,my husband and I are both side sleepers and the memory foam mattress is working great for us .
customer_reviews.author: Jutta A

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly great for the money. No delays to shipping. It came in a tight roll (which we opened on the bed frame). Plumped right up. No smell. In a guest room and has been slept on several nights. Guests said they are going to order for their guest room. I am not a fan of the memory foam type as I get a bit hot so would not use on my master bed, but this mattress can’t be beat for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kg

customer_reviews.title: Small investment for great sleep!
customer_reviews.text: I've slept on this matress for over a week and it is the best sleep I've had in a long time. I ordered my mattress around 1:30pm on a Thursday and it was delivered to my home at 10:15 am the next morning! The box was a little beat up but the mattress was wrapped up nicely. Lucid includes a tool to open the packaging. The mattress was clean and I didn't notice any strong odors. I let it "rise" for 48 hours and have enjoyed it since. I definitely recommend getting the encasement if you want to keep it pristine and moisture free!
customer_reviews.author: Sprinklesandfairydust

customer_reviews.title: its okay but
customer_reviews.text: So this mattress puffed up really fast and did so to the full 10 inches. My daughter sleeps really well on it, it doesn't seem to retain shapes or sink in easily. My only problem is I bought her the 2020medium plush and the mattress is barely softer than laying on the floor. I will probably end up returning it to try out the 2020 plush model but if thats not much softer I will be buying a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: jennie

customer_reviews.title: SUPER IMPRESSED!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband immediately began yelling at me for ordering a box mattress. I opened the box and pulled the firmly rolled mattress out, read the instructions, turned on my ceiling fan in the living room then told my husband it would rise. Well, not only did it rise in 24 hrs but by 48 hrs we had a firm awesome queen sized mattress. My husband has been having shoulder pain for 2 months and wasn't able to lay on that shoulder. Well, he raved about having his 1st night (all might) sleep without tossing and turning. And I have never laid on something so comfortable for the price I paid. This was the best investment.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya E Randall

customer_reviews.title: Even the medium is too firm!
customer_reviews.text: I got the medium 10 inch mattress hoping it wouldn't be too firm. Once I unrolled it and allowed it to inflate to my surprise there wasn't a terrible off-gas issue, but once it was full size I sat on the bed and it felt like a rock. Way too hard to be a medium and since I can't easily vacuum pack the bed and send it back, I'm stuck with it. Know that this bed is VERY VERY FIRM before you buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Mandrichter

customer_reviews.title: Horrific bed. Causes pain  and no sleep
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst bed I've ever bought in my whole life. It is so hard, like a brick hard. I never had hip pain and now I can't sleep in this bed because it has caused a crushed sciatic nerve.. the pain up my spine and hip is horrific. You will never get sleep in his bed and you end up worse than where you started.. I would not recommend this bed or company to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: tana

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress for my daughter who was always coming into my room to lay on my bed because she loved the way our mattress feels. She wanted a slightly softer mattress though and at first liked the way this one felt until after several weeks. She said it is soft but she can feel the bottom board that is under the mattress. She sinks all the way down to the board which is causing her back issues. She has never complained about having back problems but everyday she is in pain now. We are in search for a new mattress once again.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Warren

customer_reviews.title: and taking good care of it as well
customer_reviews.text: After 3 years with this mattress, and taking good care of it as well, I discovered a large patch of BLACK MOLD! This mattress is not breathable as I often thought the bed felt as if it had moisture from the air in it. I brushed it off. I wish I had not because my son has been sick quite often lately and I am concerned this may be the cause!!
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Queen Plush Model
customer_reviews.text: One half is like sleeping on a cloud and the other half is brick hard. I'm very disappointed that it did not fluff up to be a full queen. Nor is it 10 inches, I got 9. So I basically received a 9 in full size mattress. It's 3 in short in width and length of being a queen. I've not ordered a bedframe yet so now I'm wondering should I order a full size frame or a queen. Very dissatisfied with the size of this mattress. No way to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Isis

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: 3 nights in and it’s great. 4 stars because it only inflated to 9 inches and not 10. We are both about 6ft and weigh 155lbs, we sleep just fine and sink in just enough. I find that most of these reviewers withhold how heavy they are which will of course cause them to sink deep into the mattress. For US and our weight, we consider this medium- firm. We do not spend all day and all night in our bed so it has ample time to fluff back up after a long nights rest. It’s silent and not too warm.
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Best..Bed... Purchase....EVER! Split king
customer_reviews.text: Have been searching for an adjustable bed I can afford. Found it! I have been sleeping on this bed for 3 nights, and it is the best sleep I have had in years! I have bulging discs and a snoring husband, both are so much better now! Instead of wandering the house at night I'm actually sleeping & I can throw out the earplugs! Hubby was afraid it would look like a hospital bed. Nope! Looks like a normal bed, unless you are actually using it. Mattresses are lightweight compared to the "number" bed but are very comfortable. Hubby has given his stamp of approval as well! He also feels less achy in the morning. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cosmogirl

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several different Lucid Mattresses over the last 5 years or so from Queen to California King. I've always enjoyed their mattresses and my parents also wanted to get a mattress after visiting and sleeping in my guest room. They're great quality, I've never had any issues with smells and you get a really great product for the price. I haven't had any issues with losing firmness or getting worn out, they're just all around great mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3-4 years tops, then... a deep and permanent TRENCH.
customer_reviews.text: After this mattress unrolled fully and was fully decompressed, I truly liked it. My lady friend had a nice memory foam and decided to get one after a serious injury that would cause me to spend more time in bed. At about the 3 year mark, trouble came. That slight sinkhole was becoming bigger and bigger and soon became permanent. I tried rotating it 180° (not flipping) to no avail. The sinkhole is still as bad even after I go on vacation - no matter how long away. Unless this is for a cabin/not primary bed, I’d recommend staying away from this one unless I got a bunk mattress (bad humor intentional).
customer_reviews.author: christophe

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I both love the mattress. It's not cold in winter or hot in summer (although it is slightly more "firm" when colder out, but to be expected from foam). It's amazing to roll over and not disturb the sleeping person. I'm sure the sleeping person agrees. No noticeable "pain relief" compared to the old mattress, but many months in use and no issues with permanent impressions, dips, etc. No noticeable "smell" as others have reported apart from the initial few hours. We would (and have) absolutely use this mattress to replace any others in the house when the time comes for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: CaseyVR6

customer_reviews.title: Mattress is hard
customer_reviews.text: Hard hard hard. Been sleeping in it about 2 months or so hoping it’d soften up with use but it’s still hard as a brick. Seriously I could do yoga on this thing, no floor required. Might have to look into getting a softer mattress topper and see if that helps. Otherwise the mattress is nice looking, easy to install and shipped to your door. Kinda can’t beat that. So if you don’t mind hard beds, or have the money for a decent mattress topper, go for it. If you need something softer I would look into maybe a hybrid mattress as opposed to the memory foam only ones.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal S

customer_reviews.title: Medium firm is HARD
customer_reviews.text: I like a firm bed but the medium firm bed is almost unmovable. If I lay down a while I will kind of sink into it but not much at all. I also weigh a 150lbs though. They sell one more firm than this one which I couldn't imagine! I'm trying to sell this one so I can go down to a softer mattress. The quality is nice and there's no imperfections or lumps. I waited about 12+ hours before I actually put it into the bed frame so it fully expand and reached its shape
customer_reviews.author: Royal

customer_reviews.title: I am so obsessed with this mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t sleep comfortably on any other mattress now. I thought this might be too good to be true, because of the price but I figured it was worth a shot. Ended up loving it. Keep in mind, this mattress is pretty firm since it has the cooling gel layer. I love it that way though, and it really helped me with my back. I used to wake up in pain almost every day, so I really needed this. My mom tried it and loved it too, so we got one for the guest room in her house. Anyone who sleeps in it thinks it was expensive. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra money, back pain is no fun.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this mattress for a little less than two years and it started off well, if I had rated this last year I would have said it’s good. However, I’ve been waking up with back pain every morning. I go to my sisters house over the weekend sleep on a different mattress and immediately feel a difference and feel better. Go back to my lucid and it gets jacked again, I’d spend an extra 200 and buy a better mattress, the back pain is simply not worth a few hundred bucks less. It comes with a 10 year warranty, I’m hoping they let me return it.
customer_reviews.author: smadanat

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress since April. And finally decided to make a review after sleeping on it for a while. We waited 3 days until we slept on it to let it rise. After that we toss and turn all night and wake up in horrible pain. If we don't turn this mattress weekly there's two "valleys" where we sleep. Finally bit the bullet and bought a brand new mattress thats coming this week. Seriously don't waste your money. We're out the 200+ bucks because we're outside the return window and the manufacturer will not do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Foam lost its memory
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy for about 5 years. Lately the foam seems to have finally lost its memory... I emailed customer service about the warranty today. At the time I bought mine it was a "25 Year Warranty". Let's see how this plays out... Ideally, a decent company would just... Send a free replacement, tell me to just toss the old one, and I can get another (twenty?) five years out of it. I would change my rating to 5 stars and recommend to others, and probably replace my other mattress with a new one. (Happy customers = repeat customers = more money...) We'll see what they have to say.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Edlinger

customer_reviews.title: Cozy
customer_reviews.text: I am so grateful for this mattress! I have singer’s reflux and therefore sleep with a wedge under my shoulders. Sometimes, I sleep with one under my calves to create a zero gravity bed. I love it. The mattress itself was very easy to carry in the house and unpack. It came with a special opener so I wouldn’t cut through the mattress when removing all the plastic. I loved that! It took about three days to fully expand. And after about a month, I still smell off-gas, but it’s not that bad. I’m glad to have a mattress and a bed that is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: MaryKait

customer_reviews.title: Not medium firm....
customer_reviews.text: This mattress does not feel or sleep like a medium firm, it feels closer to a firm or maybe extra firm. I bought this for my RV in a queen short because I totally trust this company and their sleep products, especially their memory foam mattress toppers,of which I could not find in this size queen so I'am not to upset since before back surgery I was a firm mattress sleeper and if I still was this would be the mattress for me, so if you are looking for a firm I would recommend this highly. But I can't wait until they get my size memory topper in.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa McFadden

customer_reviews.title: Gets here quick, easy to set up, sleeps like a dream
customer_reviews.text: This isn't my 1st, or even 2nd lucid mattress. This was the 3rd one. Clearly we must like them. The price is good, they show up in a couple of days. It can be interesting getting it all into place, but its easier than a regular mattress. And watching it plump up after you take the plastic off is always fun. We have 1 for our main inside bed and have replaced 2 other beds with it. This one is for the new camper. I have recommended these to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Melissaox

customer_reviews.title: The Comfort I was Dreaming for!
customer_reviews.text: I love this LUCID mattress, it’s Perfection! I had been living with back pain and restless leg syndrome and was so uncomfortable sleeping in my old bed. The first mattress I purchased was the Ashley chime hybrid and that did not work out for me, way to uncomfortable. Amazon graciously picked up the hybrid and I decided to give the Lucid 10” gel Memory foam mattress a try, and I’m so happy I did! Not to hard, not to soft, just right. Every night is like a dream climbing into this bed, it gently embraces you and no more back pain!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids but offgasses a long time
customer_reviews.text: We have had this bed for a month and it is still off-gassing, although the smell is tolerable. It just makes me nervous since we bought this bed for our small children. I pray the chemicals used in it's production will not cause illness down the line... But I couldn't see buying an expensive natural mattress for humans who wet the bed and throw up.... I will keep you updated! It is super comfortable, I would say firm and that is what I like. My kids aren't picky. I have heard it sags eventually but this really isn't a concern for us since my kids are light weight!
customer_reviews.author: James Whiteside

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress. I had a box spring set before and my back always hurt. Thought since this one was cheap and I didnt have to go into a mattress store, it would be worth a try. I've convinced a few people to also get one since they're so cheap and comfy. I am a little bummed that it seems to be starting to sink towards the center after 1 year. But since I'm the only one using it, it makes sense. Great for what you pay for. Plan to have it for about 4 years total. Not bad. Warning: when the box arrives, have someone to help you move it. It's extremely heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Payton Elsey

customer_reviews.title: Less tossing and turning
customer_reviews.text: Installed this mattress in our motorhome and really like the comfort level. Had some reservations after reading many reports of memory foam “running hot” but we have not had any such issues with this mattress. Mattress feels firm when laying down at first (compared to typical innerspring mattress) but quickly adapts to relieve pressure points. My first night was a welcome respite from turing side to side trying to get comfortable. Would recommend highly for anyone looking for a mattress to place on a fixed platform. (no box spring)
customer_reviews.author: Mike the Mechanic

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Our Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this is a very inexpensive mattress, but don’t let that discourage you from purchasing. We had a bed made to fit a small bedroom. We bought this thinking it would last until we could decide on a better one. Well This lucid mattress is very comfortable and my husband is a big man. We are pleasantly surprised and pleased. In 3 mo this I’ll do an update, but for now : Very little odor that dissipated in a few hours. I. In just Two days mattress swelled up to normal and is quite thick and cool to lay on. So far we feel we made an excellent choice. We shall see how it endures over time.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: back pain maximized
customer_reviews.text: I'm not here to tell how and why, I just the state the facts. Before I had this mattress I would have periodic back pain. Now I have constant back pain. The mattress looks and feels fine but this is what's happening to me since I been sleeping on this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Vetyaz

customer_reviews.title: Comfort in a box
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my motor home in the full sz because it is a Class C and it was a tight fit and this was a few inches smaller than the others on Amazon. It fit perfectly, is quite comfortable for me, I am a small person. I ordered the extra soft model.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy R

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress! Both hubby & I are happy!
customer_reviews.text: My husband & I have differing opinions on bed firmness. We stayed in an AirBNB & found THE perfect mattress. We both had a great night sleep! We asked the host what the mattress was, bought it & had it shipped to our house so when we arrived home from our trip, our new mattress was there! We followed the directions to a T (despite not wanting to wait 48 hours to sleep on it) and we have been extremely impressed! We’ve had it now for a couple months & still happy as we were the first night!
customer_reviews.author: nurselauren83

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase
customer_reviews.text: Best mattress purchase I have ever made. I have had this bed almost a year now, and couldn't be happier. I was worried at first, given I am a plus size woman and a lot of people complained about dents in the foam after a few months. But I have no experienced any problems. Buy it now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Boone

customer_reviews.title: Much too hard— hurts my back
customer_reviews.text: We bought a “medium feel” mattress last fall but didn’t end up using it until about a week ago. The mattress is way too firm and has barely any of the give/support I associate with memory foam. Within 3 nights of sleeping on it my lower back was a mess. We bought a memory foam topper hoping that would help, but it’s still uncomfortable and hurting my back. We will probably try to sell it and buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kater

customer_reviews.title: Concrete slab
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in July and gave it plenty of test time. That being said this bed sucks. It's advertised as plush but there is absolutely nothing plush about it. If you poured a concrete slab and laid one of those cheap matress toppers on it you would have this matress. I bought it because I'm a side sleeper and it's supposed to be soft but I wake up every morning with hip pain, probably because I'm sleeping on a board. Back sleepers who like firm may have better luck but all others should steer clear of this matress.
customer_reviews.author: philsr

customer_reviews.title: NO WARRANTY
customer_reviews.text: When you purchase any LUCID product through a seller on Amazon, you WILL NOT have warranty coverage. Within 8 months, this bed caved in the middle so badly I am unable to sleep on it anymore. After jumping through many hoops with LUCID, I was told there is no warranty coverage because I purchased it through an unauthorized seller on Amazon. Out $400 and no bed. Thanks Amazon and LUCID!
customer_reviews.author: Francis Sparks

customer_reviews.title: FULL OF FIBERGLASS
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this bed. The fiberglass inner cover will deteriorate. I took off the cover to wash, as instructed by the tag, and my entire room has been engulfed in fiberglass. I've been cleaning for days. I had to throw away the bed and all my bedding and I'm salvaging what I can in my room. It even got inside computers. Cleaning it has scratched up my desks and my monitors and other electronics. Be careful buying a memory foam mattress, as most have this fiber glass in them. Time for another itchy night sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A terrible bed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed 3 years ago and it is terrible. I was never able to get ahold of the manufacturer about the bed. It is in no way firm. You sink down minutes after laying in bed. Wake up in pain weather neck or back. And when I opened it it had bed bugs. I had to keep spraying it for weeks. I was never able to get a new bed because it was out of my budget. And now I’m finally fed up with it. 100% do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle Tharp

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I had been using a traditional spring mattress that needed to be retired. We bought this after reading thousands of reviews on this one and others like it. I am very pleased. It is a little harder than I thought it would be, but as you lay down the mattress softens some and molds to your shape, but not so much that you get that sinking in feeling. We both feel like we have slept better. My husband has a pinched nerve in his neck, when sleeping on the spring mattress he would wake up in the night with his arm numb and tingling at times. So far this has not happened on the Lucid Mattress.
customer_reviews.author: ShM

customer_reviews.title: SUPRISED COMFORT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lucid brand because I got the chance to feel one in person (thanks to a good friend of mine) and It has the perfect amount of firmness to squishy ratio. Accurate 10-inch as advertised rolled it out on the floor and let it rise for 12 hours. It rose to shape perfectly and I have been sleeping on it for 2 weeks now. Not disappointed at all. No funny smells, I have no complaints. If there happens to be an issue that arises sometime soon I will update this review. THANK YOU FOR THE BEST SLEEP OF MY LIFE.
customer_reviews.author: bell

customer_reviews.title: Very very firm mattress, not soft at all.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress because ours was worn out after 10 years. This mattress was advertised as not to hard and not to soft. A perfect mattress for a great night sleep. This mattress is as hard as sleeping on the floor. There is no give in the mattress. I am so sad as I now wake up with upper and lower back pain. If you want a mattress to alleviate back pain this is not the one. I waited for a few weeks to give my honest review as I wanted to make sure the mattress was fully inflated, it is and still hard. If you do however like a very very firm mattress you would love it.
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this bed for about a year and a half. I’ve noticed it is starting to be squished in the middle where I sleep every night. I haven’t rotated the mattress at all though. No smell. Very comfortable! I haven’t had any issues and it was true to size. Not super heavy which I appreciate when I have to move.
customer_reviews.author: Bella Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Hard & worst night sleep
customer_reviews.text: Chiropractor is a must after sleeping on this bed. Your hips sink in and your shoulders cant push down, so you sleep like a "V" on your side. I've given it several chances and tried breaking the mattress in with heat and weights. I was stuck with this mattress because you cant really deflate it to return it, so now I have awful mattresses taking up space. I researched heavily, but chose wrong! I hope you don't make the same mistake. Next time I can save up for a replacement mattress it will be from the store, so I can try it out and return it within 30 days!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: First day, but not my first Lucid mattress
customer_reviews.text: The reason I gave it 5 stars (and have only had this mattress one day) is that I had this mattress in a twin size and slept on it for 7 months straight. Upgraded to the queen and hoping for the same quality and comfort. If not I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Jon F

customer_reviews.title: It started out ok
customer_reviews.text: We have owned our mattress less than six months. It has passed the condition of the traditional mattress it replaced. We expected years of comfort not months. The mattress sags(cups) and creates unnatural angles, which leads to many joint pains. Top to bottom, daily headaches, jaw pain shoulder pain, elbows and even numb hands. Back upper and lower pains as well as hip. Not enough support. Knees also ache daily. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: M Grass

customer_reviews.title: 2 yrs and still going strong.
customer_reviews.text: Its June 2020 and the mattress is still going strong. I was just what I was looking for, a inexpensive, Firm mattress, that would last. So far I have no sinking. It has maintained is firmness in the 2 years I owned it. I do have a cover on it so its not the coolest mattress but that is my own doing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Not Lucid in the slightest
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is absolutely awful. Purchased it in April and by August it was already sagging where my and my fiancée slept. And that is with turning the mattress every time we changed the sheets. Can’t get comfortable on it and haven’t gotten a good nights sleep in ages on this bed. It’s so terrible we had to go and purchase a different much better bed just four months after getting this one. No one should waste their money on this mattress. There are other better options that cost the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Brad G

customer_reviews.title: Too firm and uneven
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress because a friend of mine had bought one a year ago and told me it's a good mattress. But it isn't. I bought the medium feel one, but it's too firm. Funny thing is that my friend also has the medium feel, but his is not as firm. The mattress also looks a bit uneven at some spots and seems to have different firmness on different spots.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Very firm.
customer_reviews.text: My sister doesn't like this bed much but it is exactly what she asked for! She said "I want a firm, memory foam, and gel mattress." She got it all right! When you sit on it you don't sink like my memory foam mattress. You stay pert atop the bed and i think its great for the back because it keeps you straight. Just be aware, it is a FIRM mattress. Don't buy this unless you want a mattress that, while it is soft, keeps its shape and wont let you break it in easy.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: HEAVEN!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I sleep in a cloud every night. Seriously! My bed sleeps so good. I have the Lucid “10” memory foam mattress (medium feel) and the Lucid “3” gel memory foam topper. I have had it for about 3 weeks almost and With my down comforter to cover up with on top of these 2 I really do feel like I sleep in a cloud. Get you this mattress with the topper and a nice down comforter, YOU WILL BE IN HEAVEN!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable (medium), great price and durable.
customer_reviews.text: ***Update*** So still have a small area not expanded, manufacturer suggested heat the room or walk on mattress to lose the coil as it may be stuck from storage. We'll try and give it another week. We liked our first purchase (in Jan 2020) so much that we decided to buy a second one for the guest room. ***Not so fast. The second one isn't expanding the way it should. We have had it open for 3 days now (received on Wed, today is Sat) and there's still one area that has not expanded completely. Going to wait until Monday and then call the manufacturer to see what they suggest.**** Will update....update at top.
customer_reviews.author: CeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my new bed
customer_reviews.text: Got the bed quickly in a very large box. Have to say it's over 50 lbs. Very easy to unpack and set up. This is my first memory foam mattress. I agree with others that it is VERY firm. I like a firm mattress but it was a little much for me so i put the Lucid Plush Topper on it ...now it's perfect. I've had 3 weeks of great sleep. As of now this will be the next mattress I buy for another bedroom. Will update if anything changes
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: LUCID mattresses are the BEST!  This is our third one!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love LUCID mattresses! This is our third one to purchase, and we purchased the queen short to upgrade the mattress in our travel trailer. I absolutely love the support that these mattresses give, you do not overheat in them, and they’re just all-around amazing mattresses this is our third one to purchase, and we purchased the queen short to upgrade the mattress in our travel trailer. I absolutely love the support that these mattresses give, you do not overheat in them, and they’re just all-around amazing mattresses!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley P. Osborne

customer_reviews.title: I love this mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress! It doesn't slide around on its platform even then the slightest. It is firm, yet conforms to my personal shape, offering great support. The mattress does not keep a dent though. Rather, it springs right back to looking as though I never slept there. It's wonderful. It is a solid, heavy mattress, though. A previous reviewer suggested leaving the plastic on it until you get it into the bedroom, and that was wise advice. Give your new mattress several hours to poor itself up to its maximum size, so it's best to put it in place in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Koch

customer_reviews.title: A firm beauty
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect mattress! It definitely exceeded my expectations. Great quality for a great price. I allowed my mattress to expand for 12 hours before I used it(instructions advise 48 hrs). I wouldn't recommend skipping instructions...but I did it and it seems to be fine. My LUCID mattress is about 9 1/2 inch. Be warned, it is FIRM! If you prefer to sink deep into your mattress, this is probably not the one for you. In that case, I suggest you check out LUCID's other types (as some mattresses are softer than others).
customer_reviews.author: Cstober

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter loves this mattress
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought two, at the same time from Walmart, but somehow the second one never came. I told them to cancelled the order because it was going to take an addition week to get to me. With Amazon it was 3 days, it did cost $20 more, but at least she actually got the item. The item itself is great. It re-inflates, you don't have to do anything. Let it rest for 48 hrs to fully "mature" to it's normal state. You'll enjoy the mattress better. My daughter states "Not too hard Not too soft Just right."
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I had rented a condo that had this mattress, so I knew I liked it. I'm over the heavy, awkward standard mattresses and was eager for a light weight on. It arrived very quickly and for a real bargain price: I could have easily paid 4 times as much for a similar mattress!! Works great with my slated bed frame (no problem where the two sets of slats meet in the middle). Be warned that when they say "unpack, relax, enjoy", they mean relax for 48 hours while the foam expands back to it's normal thickness (it does come tightly rolled up into a box!). Plan ahead and you won't be dissappointed!
customer_reviews.author: mlp

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Price reflects quality. I’ve had this mattress for years and even with constant rotation it literally just sinks when you lay on. Almost feels like you’re sleeping on the frame. Warranty is littered with all different clauses that slow lucid to not replace. Might be fine if plans are to use in a guest room that isn’t used often but is a terrible choice for a primary mattress. Cheap mattress for relatively cheap price I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Olive

customer_reviews.title: Delivered on time and firmness is medium
customer_reviews.text: Good product as of now. Hoping it lasts years. Firmness is medium. My brother also purchased one and warned it might get softer over time so if you like firm... This might not be the mattress for you. I like firm but got used to this one immediately. It's been seeming to maintain its medium firmness for a couple months now. Abide by the 48 hr expansion after opening. Thats probably really important. Oh... I travel a lot so if I slept on it every night it might end up being on the softer side.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Paladino

customer_reviews.title: Defective!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought my daughter a mattress and it inflated quite nicely so we decided to buy our own and I was so excited to open it, and then it didn't really inflate so I waited 3-4 days and there are still places in the mattress where its stuck together and uneven, which really bummed me out because I had really liked it but as you can see in the pictures in looks like a pancake. 06/29/20 After over two weeks the mattress has still not completely inflated, still between 7 1/2 and 8 1/2 inches high smh!! Lucid customer service suggest to wait about 2 weeks for it to totally expand, but nothin happened.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: This mattress is really firm
customer_reviews.text: I prefer a firm mattress, so when looking for a foam mattress for the spare room, I ordered this one. But it is firmer than is comfortable. So now I will eventually buy a mattress topper to make the bed more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: This is my type of mattress-I want a queen size one now !
customer_reviews.text: I have been very afraid to make a foam mattress purchase online. This mattress is firm with some cushion as described. Before buying consider the options on available types of foam, and know which type is right for you. I was going to order a Queen size, but decided to order a twin to test out the firmness on this mattress- It is very firm with just enough cushion to keep from getting sore. I will be making a purchase in future for a queen size. So far I love the mattress, and my neck, shoulder, and arm pain has stopped bothering me. Im a side, to back, to opposite side sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Asche

product_meta.title: LUCID 10 Inch 2019 Gel Memory Foam Mattress - Medium Firm Feel - CertiPUR-US Certified (Queen)
product_meta.description: Style:2019 Model Medium| Size:QueenA combined 2.5-inch layer of ventilated gel memory foam and a 7.5-inch layer of high density support foam gives a pressure-relieving and supportive mattress for a MEDIUM-FIRM feel. The top memory foam layer is designed to prevent heat build-up; microscopic gel beads capture heat and move it away from the body to help regulate temperature as you sleep. This surface layer of memory foam has a ventilated design that improves airflow. The open cell structure of LUCID memory foam makes for a longer lasting, more resilient foam that will not leave long-lasting body impressions. Soft, Breathable CoverMade of a cozy TENCEL blend fabric (10 percent TENCEL lyocell, 90 percent polyester), the soft cover creates a breathable air layer at the top of the mattress. This mattress is CertiPUR-US certified, which means the foam has been independently tested for safety of materials used, physical performance and environmental stewardship. Careful construction guarantees no prohibited phthalates, no ozone depleters, no CFCs, no mercury, no formaldehyde, no PBDEs, and low emission (VOCs) for indoor air quality. This mattress does not contain synthetic or natural latex of any kind. We offer a 10-Year that protects the mattress and cover against manufacturer defect. All of our products are shipped vacuum packed, so your mattress is easy to transport and set up. After your mattress arrives, simply take the package into the right room, remove it from the box and protective wrap, and then watch as it expands.
feature_bullets: This dual-layer mattress combines 2.5 inch gel infused, ventilated memory foam surface + 7.5 inch high density foam base for a MEDIUM-FIRM feel
Gel infused memory foam regulates temperature while conforming to the body to ease pressure points
Temperature-regulating, moisture-controlling TENCEL blend fabric cover creates a comfortable air layer
Memory Foam is Hypoallergenic and CertiPUR-US certified for safety and performance
We only use CertiPUR US certified memory foam to ensure your uncompromising safety and comfort
Compressed, rolled, and shipped in a box for simple setup; easily fits through narrow hallways and staircases

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars13,441 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: 25-year limited warranty guarantees that your lucid mattress will be replaced, repaired or refunded at our discretion if it is deemed defective due to faulty workmanship or structural defects. The warranty does not cover normal changes in softness or resilience that do not affect the performance of the mattress. Small body impressions less than 1. 5 inches are normal and not covered under the warranty. The warranty applies only to the original purchaser. Abuse, stains on the cover or mattress, or platform or box foundation support will void any warranty. Lucid shall not be liable for any consequential losses arising from the purchase, installation and/or use of this product. For complete warranty information go to lucidmattress. Com read before opening: carefully remove plastic packaging being careful not to cut through to the mattress. Place compressed mattress on a flat surface in a well-ventilated room and allow 48 hours for expansion. Due to the unique properties of memory foam, dimensions after expansion will vary; this is normal and will not affect the performance of your new mattress. New memory foam may initially have a slight odor; it is completely harmless and will dissipate over a short time with regular use.
